home.description: Here's my attempt to convince you that I am semi-competent at this tech stuff.  You know I like making my lists.  I built this so that we can keep track of different things in our relationship.  So far I have a few blog posts, a checklist of goals, and a counter for important dates.  (sorry for all the bugs)
